## Data VDem

```{r}
# Load ESS data
dat_vdem <- read_csv("V-Dem-CY-Full+Others-v15.csv")
```

## Looking at Rule Of law index

```{r}
summary(dat_vdem$v2x_rule) # median 0.46, mean 0.4945
table(dat_vdem[, c("country_name", "year", "v2x_rule")])
dat_vdem %>%
  filter(country_name == "Switzerland") %>%
  select(country_name, year, v2x_rule)
```
